scripts.d1:push:dev: wrangler d1 execute potato-charts-dev --remote --file=./prisma/migrations/$(ls -t prisma/migrations | head -1)/migration.sql
scripts.d1:push:prod: wrangler d1 execute potato-charts --remote --file=./prisma/migrations/$(ls -t prisma/migrations | head -1)/migration.sql
scripts.d1:push:all:dev: for file in prisma/migrations/*/migration.sql; do wrangler d1 execute potato-charts-dev --remote --file="$file"; done
scripts.d1:push:all:prod: for file in prisma/migrations/*/migration.sql; do wrangler d1 execute potato-charts --remote --file="$file"; done
